name: Collapsus - Early Access Build #31
description:
HOW TO PLAY:

Unlike many other puzzle games, Collapsus is NOT about "swapping" blocks. Instead, you must click on blocks to permanently destroy them in order to make columns or rows of 4 or more blocks.

Be careful! By doing this, the block meter at the bottom starts to go down with every click, and when it's all gone: it's GAME OVER! By making these columns or rows of 4 or more, you get some of those blocks back... it's a unique risk-reward resource management mechanic!

You can also TURN the screen in any of the for directions (using the buttons in the lower right, the A/D keys, or the arrow keys) to change how the blocks fall, opening up a whole new world of possibilities!

There are even special blocks that go up next to your score (called the "dock") where you can access them later by clicking on them!

Every week, we will be providing a brand new build chock-full of new content until we release!
